metadataAttributes.Title: The Outcomes and Interventions of Health Informatics
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: For clinical data science to be effective in healthcare—to achieve the outcomes desired—it must translate into decision support of some sort, either at the patient, clinician, or manager level. By the end of this course, students will be able to articulate the need for an intervention, to right size it, to choose the appropriate technology, to describe how knowledge should be obtained, and to design a monitoring plan.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Knowledge Acquisition,Decision Tree,Decision-Making,Decision Support System,Health Informatics,
